action_bar_actions._description: The label for the actions dropdown on the action button bar

alert_close._description: Screen reader text for the close button on alerts

card_checkbox_label._description: Label for the multiselect checkbox for the card component

checklist_clear_all._description: Text for the link in a checklist to clear selections.

checklist_no_items._description: Text in a checklist when no items are shown based on the current filter.

checklist_select_all._description: Text for the link in a checklist to select all items.

checklist_show_selected._description: Text for the checkbox in a checklist to show only selected items.

confirm_dialog_default_ok_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's OK button

confirm_dialog_default_yes_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's Yes button

confirm_dialog_default_no_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's No button

confirm_dialog_default_cancel_text._description: Default text for confirm dialog's Cancel button

errormodal_ok._description: Text used on the primary button to dismiss the error modal.

grid_action_bar_cancel_mobile_actions._description: Close the menu where you choose an action in mobile multiselect.

grid_action_bar_choose_action._description: Open a menu to choose an action in mobile  multiselect.

grid_action_bar_clear_selection._description: Clear the selections in the grid.

grid_back_to_top._description: Text for link in grid to scroll back to the top.

grid_column_picker_all_categories._description: Button text for category filters used to indicate that all columns should be shown in the column picker

grid_column_picker_cancel._description: Button text for cancelling changes made in the grid column picker

grid_column_picker_description_header._description: In the column picker, the header for the column showing the description of the columns to include in the grid.

grid_column_picker_header._description: Header text for the grid column picker screen
grid_column_picker_header.message: Choose columns to show in the list

grid_column_picker_name_header._description: In the column picker, the header for the column showing the names of the columns to include in the grid.

grid_column_picker_search_placeholder._description: Search text placeholder for the search box on the grid column picker

grid_column_picker_submit._description: Button text for applying changes made in the grid column picker

grid_columns_button._description: Label for secondary actions button to select columns to display in a grid.

grid_columns_toolbar_button._description: Label for toolbar button to select columns to display in a grid.

grid_filters_apply._description: Text for button on filters flyout to apply the selected filters to the grid

grid_filters_button._description: Label for button to select filters to be applied to a grid.

grid_filters_clear._description: Text for button on filters flyout to clear the selected filters for the grid

grid_filters_header._description: Header text for grid filters flyout

grid_filters_hide._description: Hide link text for grid filters flyout

grid_filters_summary_header._description: Header text for filter summary on top of grid

grid_load_more._description: The text for the button to load additional rows into the grid if more rows are available.

infinite_scroll_load_more_button._description: Text for loading more in the infinite scroll button

list_show_secondary_actions._description: Title for the button that opens the secondary actions menu in the list toolbar

list_show_secondary_actions_button._description: Button text for the button that opens the secondary actions menu in the list toolbar

open_help._description: Text for modal header Open Help button

modal_footer_cancel_button._description: Default label text for modal cancel button

modal_footer_primary_button._description: Default label text for modal primary button

number_billion_abrev._description: Abreviation for Billion used by numbers

number_million_abrev._description: Abreviation for million used by numbers

number_thousands_abrev._description: Abreviation for Thousands used by numbers

number_trillion_abrev._description: Abreviation for Trillion used by numbers

page_noaccess_description.message:
Sorry, you don't have rights to this page.
If you feel you should, please contact your system administrator.

page_noaccess_header.message: Move along, there's nothing to see here

reorder_top._description: Text displayed to indicate that a row can be pushed to the top of the list

repeater_item_checkbox_label._description: Label for the repeater item checkbox for the repeater component

select_field_multiple_select_open_button._description: The default button text for the select field when the user is allowed to select multiple values (plural)

select_field_multiple_select_picker_head._description: The default heading text for the select field picker when the user is allowed to select multiple values (plural)

select_field_multiple_select_summary._description: Text displayed when the user has more than the maximum items selected

select_field_single_select_placeholder._description: The default placeholder text for the select field when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

select_field_single_select_picker_headin._description: The default heading text for the select field picker when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

select_field_single_select_open_button_t._description: The default title text for the select field picker when the user is allowed to select one value (singular)

select_field_single_select_clear_button_._description: The default button text for the single-select clear button

select_field_picker_close_button._description: Text displayed on the button in multi select mode to close form

select_field_picker_save_button._description: Text displayed on the primary dialog button to confirm selection of multiple items

select_field_picker_show_all_category._description: The default category name for the select field picker that will display all possible results.

text_expand_close_text._description: Text for the close button on the text expand modal

tile_settings._description: Label for settings button in the tile

tile_grab_handle._description: Label for grab handle in the tile
tile_grab_handle.message: Use arrow keys to reorder. Press up and down arrow keys to change position in column. Press left and right arrow keys to change position to another column.

tile_moved_assistive_text._description: Report of the new location of a recently moved tile
tile_moved_assistive_text.message: {0} moved. Current column: {1} of {2}. Current position in column: {3} of {4}

vertical_tabs_show_tabs_text._description: The default text for the show tabs button in mobile

wizard_navigator_finish._description: Text displayed on the next button when a wizard is ready for completion.

wizard_navigator_next._description: Text displayed on a wizard's next button.

wizard_navigator_previous._description: Text displayed on a wizard's previous button.
